pages.text: $(br2)$(l)Monoliths$() are arcane constructions which a Sorcerer uses to generate and store $(l:basic_info/arcana)Arcana$(/l).$(br2)There are a number of different types of monolith, all with differing principles of arcana generation.$(br2)A monolith can be constructed by placing a specially prepared runestone block onto two polished runestone blocks.
